metadata.title: Wednesday, 22nd October, 2014
metadata.session: FOURTH SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Mines, Energy and Water Development how many dams are earmarked for construction in Katete District in 2014.
Minister of Transport, Works, Supply and Communication
parts: (a)    whether the tarring of the Pedicle Road is on schedule;
(b)    if it is not, what has caused the delay;
(c)    what the time-frame for completing the project is; and
(d)    whether the contractor has the capacity to complete the project on time.
